ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::ObjectBackendRegistration###CustomerUser
ConfigItem.Description: Object backend module registration for the import/export module.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerUserImport::DefaultCustomerID
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which customer ID to use if no company defined - only relevant for new customer users.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerUserImport::DefaultEmailAddress
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which email address to use if not defined - strongly depends on backend configuration!!!.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerUserImport::EMailDomainCustomerIDMapping
ConfigItem.Description: Defines a mapping of email domains to customer IDs. A special key value is ANYTHINGELSE, which is similar to default customer ID but also affects updates.

ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::CustomerUserImportExport::ForceCSVMappingRecreation
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if CSV-mappings are re-created on next package reinstallation or upgrade if already existent.
